p: The infection of cells was performed at an MOI of 2 for 6 h. The harvested cells were frozen and thawed three times and then spun down at 13000 x g for 5 min. The supernatant containing virus was collected to infect cells for 12 h. The cells then were stained with crystal violet solution (2%) Then by using the Inverted microscope, the viral plaque formation were counted.
